text: saukhya sewa adhyaksha janaral

shatha ardha panycha ansha bhujah yanuyen siyaye andekin pasin kotasak ath ya yi dashabahu da wadasha ardha ardha lochanah yanuyen dolose adin adak neth ya yi thun neth da winshathi ardha ardha murdha yanuyen wisse adin andak wath ya yi pas wath da ganina.
